fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Hide:** Hide yourself in a block of stone, making all visits against you fail. If Steve mines on a night you do this, your ability fails
**Surprise:** Jump out from the ground at a player, and attack them. If they have any attack, you die instead

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: **Grind:** When you die, drop XP, which powers the headâ€™s attack by one tier the next night
